63A.comments: This is a core course for the Diploma in Education - Adult Learning  and  Education, the Diploma in Education - Health Education, the Adult Learning  and  Education UG Certificate Program, and the Minor in Education - Community, Adult and Higher Education.Registration will be blocked when the course is full.A priority sequence waitlist is available for this course (ADHE 327 W3A). For information about how ADHE wait lists function, please visit https://pdce.educ.ubc.ca/online-courses/.

description: Planning, conducting and evaluating instruction for adults.  Consideration is given to different beliefs and ways of thinking about teaching.
